front.title: PKI support in Hierarchical Mobile IPv6

abstract.t: Hierarchical Mobile IPv6 (HMIPv6) is one of the key technologies for global IP mobility service network. A Home Agent (HA) and a Mobility Anchor Point (MAP) can manage the movement of Mobile Nodes (MNs) dispersedly. The HA provides MNs with global mobility and the MAP provides them with local mobility.
